Package lapr4.shodrone.utentemanagement.application

Class AcceptRefuseSignupRequestControllerTxImpl

java.lang.Object
lapr4.shodrone.utentemanagement.application.AcceptRefuseSignupRequestControllerTxImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptRefuseSignupRequestController
@UseCaseController public class AcceptRefuseSignupRequestControllerTxImpl extends Object implements AcceptRefuseSignupRequestController
The transactional controller for the use case "accept/refuse a signup request".

following the guideline that a controller should only change one Aggregate, we shouldn't be changing all these entities here, but should instead use asynchronous events. However in this case we will take advantage of TransactionalContext

Author:
AJS on 08/04/2016.
